# Class SequentialGraphBuilder

A graph builder that constructs a sequential graph from a list of nodes. Automatically links nodes with one-directional edges from the first to the last and sets the start and end nodes accordingly.

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#graph/dsl/sequential_graph_builder.SequentialGraphBuilder))

  * [GraphBuilder](./graph_dsl_graph_builder.GraphBuilder)
    * SequentialGraphBuilder



##### Index

Creates a new instance of `SequentialGraphBuilder` and builds the sequential graph.

#### Parameters

    * opts: SequentialGraphBuilderProps

The configuration options for the sequential graph builder.

### addEdge

  * addEdge(  
fromNode: string | [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode),  
toNode: string | [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode),  
options?: {  
condition?: CustomEdgeConditionReference | [EdgeConditionCallback](/types/graph_EdgeConditionExecutor.EdgeConditionCallback);  
conditionExpression?: string;  
loop?: boolean;  
optional?: boolean;  
},  
): this

Adds an edge connecting two nodes in the graph.

#### Parameters

    * fromNode: string | [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)

Source node

    * toNode: string | [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node) | [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)

Destination node

    * `Optional`options: {  
condition?: CustomEdgeConditionReference | [EdgeConditionCallback](/types/graph_EdgeConditionExecutor.EdgeConditionCallback);  
conditionExpression?: string;  
loop?: boolean;  
optional?: boolean;  
}

Optional edge configuration

      * ##### `Optional`condition?: CustomEdgeConditionReference | [EdgeConditionCallback](/types/graph_EdgeConditionExecutor.EdgeConditionCallback)

Reference to a registered custom condition or a callback to register one

      * ##### `Optional`conditionExpression?: string

CEL expression for conditional execution

      * ##### `Optional`loop?: boolean

Whether the edge creates a loop

      * ##### `Optional`optional?: boolean

Whether the edge is optional

#### Returns this

The builder instance for method chaining

Inherited from [GraphBuilder](./graph_dsl_graph_builder.GraphBuilder).[addEdge](./graph_dsl_graph_builder.GraphBuilder#addedge)




### addIntentSubgraph

  * addIntentSubgraph(  
id: string,  
parameters: IntentSubgraphProps,  
): [SequentialGraphBuilder]()

Adds an intent subgraph to the graph.

#### Parameters

    * id: string

Unique identifier for the subgraph

    * parameters: IntentSubgraphProps

Intent subgraph parameters

      * ##### intents

Array of intent configurations

      * ##### promptTemplate

Template for LLM prompting

      * ##### llmComponent

LLM component instance or configuration

      * ##### embedderComponent

Embedder component instance or configuration

      * ##### similarityThreshold

Similarity threshold for matching

      * ##### textGenerationConfig

Text generation configuration

      * ##### maxIntentsForLLM

Maximum intents to send to LLM

      * ##### maxPhrasesPerIntent

Maximum phrases per intent

      * ##### embeddingSimilarityThreshold

Embedding similarity threshold

      * ##### topNIntents

Number of top intents to return

#### Returns [SequentialGraphBuilder]()

The graph instance for method chaining

Inherited from [GraphBuilder](./graph_dsl_graph_builder.GraphBuilder).[addIntentSubgraph](./graph_dsl_graph_builder.GraphBuilder#addintentsubgraph)

### addSequentialNode

  * addSequentialNode(node: [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)): [SequentialGraphBuilder]()

Adds a node to the graph, links it from the previous end node (if any), and sets the passed node as the new end node.

#### Parameters

    * node: [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)

The node to add to the graph.

#### Returns [SequentialGraphBuilder]()

The current builder instance.
